hi: I'm trying to run parted on a flash drive, but I'm getting "Error: Input/output error during write on /dev/sdb"
then it makes sense. It tries to write more then the drive can handle. Just partition it.
you're trying to write an infinite amount of null bytes to a drive which has a limit.
does the drive have a write-lock or some other form of physical protection against access/write? Perhaps some sort of switch?
what command(s) do you give parted?
you wrote NULL on your entire device, which may have (more then likely) removed your partition table. You should recreate that first
